column1: Art Institute of Chicago////Dear Art Institute of Chicago. How do you justify having an entire Asian art section and nothing from the Philippines? Illinois has the third-largest population of Filipinos after Hawaii and California. And the only Asian-American group that outnumbers Filipinos are the Chinese. So yes
column4: even Indian-Americans. Not only should your Asian art collection showcase more modern artists
column5: but you also would be wise to move beyond China
column9: and enrich your collection to reflect the people around you. My friends and I enjoyed your museum
column10: but we were all disappointed after looking at every single piece in the Asian section and realizing Â that we were looking for something that wasn't even there.
